data.text: @MartinRemains With any luck Independent SAGE will still be broadcasting on Friday and we will get whatever facts are available now. Anecdotally, I know more people now that are either infected or have just recovered  so it feels like infections are rising.
@MartinRemains Yes I couldn’t find it last time I looked.
@CountrySkills I don’t. I used to get that info from the government website.
@MartinRemains Looking at the interactive maps, the differences in the rates per 100k across the country.  I wish I could make more sense of things...
@MartinRemains You don’t happen to have an updated test positivity graph?
